description: Turn an [abstract-leveldown] iterator into a readable stream.

level-concat-iterator.description: Concatenate items from an iterator into an array.

level-codec.description: Encode keys, values and ltgte options. Used in [encoding-down].

level-test.description: Easily run your `level-*` tests against [all stores](#stores).
level-test.author: Dominic Tarr

level-lazy-open.description: Lazily open a leveldown compatible backend.

changeset.description: Generate diff changesets for javascript objects, decomposing diffs into a series of puts and delete operations. The format is compatible with [levelup] batch operations. Useful to synchronize objects.

level-delete-range.description: Delete a range of keys from [levelup].
